name: John Cage's Homemade Bread
keywords: flour, whole wheat flour, side dish
recipeIngredient: 5 cups vegetable puree or gruel (see note)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine puree and flour in a large mixing bowl. Mix thoroughly. If the mixture is too liquid to knead add more flour. If too dry add more liquid.
Knead the mixture for 10 minutes. Turn into an 8 1/2-by-4 1/2-by-2 1/2 breadpan.
Bake in a pre-heated 375 degree oven for 1 hour 15 minutes.
Turn out onto a rack and cool.
